name: Fey Wanderer
description: The Fey Wanderer embodies the magic and mirth of the Feywild. Whether through a boon from an archfey or a magical encounter, you blend the enchantment of the fey with the martial prowess of a ranger.

dreadful_strikes.description: At 3rd level, you can infuse your weapon strikes with psychic energy, causing extra damage.

details.extra_damage: 1d4 psychic damage, increasing to 1d6 at 11th level.
details.activation: The extra damage can only be dealt once per turn.

fey_wanderer_magic.description: Also at 3rd level, you gain access to additional spells that reflect your fey connection.

feywild_gifts.description: You receive a fey gift, which can be chosen or determined randomly.

gifts.1: Illusory butterflies flutter around you while you take a short or long rest.
gifts.2: Fresh, seasonal flowers sprout from your hair each dawn.
gifts.3: You faintly smell of cinnamon, lavender, nutmeg, or another comforting herb or spice.
gifts.4: Your shadow dances while no one is looking directly at it.
gifts.5: Horns or antlers sprout from your head.
gifts.6: Your skin and hair change color to match the season at each dawn.

otherworldly_glamour.description: At 3rd level, your fey qualities grant you a supernatural charm.

details.charisma_bonus: You gain a bonus to Charisma checks equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1).
details.skill_proficiency: You gain proficiency in Deception, Performance, or Persuasion.

beguiling_twist.description: Beginning at 7th level, the magic of the Feywild helps you and those around you resist charm and fear.

details.saving_throws: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.
details.reaction_ability: When you or a creature you can see succeeds on a saving throw against charm or fear, you can use your reaction to force a different creature within 120 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. If the save fails, the target is charmed or frightened by you for 1 minute.

fey_reinforcements.description: At 11th level, you can call upon fey allies for assistance.

details.summon_fey: You know the Summon Fey spell and can cast it once without using a spell slot. You regain this ability on a long rest. The spell can be modified to not require concentration, changing its duration to 1 minute.

misty_wanderer.description: At 15th level, you can use Misty Step to teleport swiftly and bring others along.

details.misty_step_uses: You can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once), regaining all uses after a long rest.
details.companion_teleport: When you cast Misty Step, you can bring one willing creature within 5 feet of you to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of your destination.
